name: Sanctuary (flowG)
description:
For Ludum Dare 45, https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/$173134

Weird prototype I made after I couldn't think of an idea involving 'nothing.' I didn't want to shoe-horn in a theme-related mechanic so I just downloaded a bunch of free assets and started making something. Asset credits appear at the end of the game.
